original: Josefson, Sten, disponent, Ulricehamn, f. 11/3/14 i Ulricehamn av grosshandl. Erik J. o. Ingeborg Andersson. — Stud:ex. i Borås 33, Gbgs hand :inst. fackkurs f. stud. 34, Höhere Fachschule f. Wirkerei- und Stricke-reiindustrie i Chemnitz 37, prakt, inom textilind. i Tyskl. o. Schv^eiz. Stud :res. t. Tyskl., Schv^eiz, Frankr., Belg. o. Tjeckoslov. Disp. o. led. av styr. f. A-B Erik Josefson & Co. i Ulricehamn sed. 38. Suppl. i styr. f. Ulricehamns Tidn. A-B, verkst. dir. där 43-46, Led. av stadsfullm. (h) sed. 43 siamt av des’s beredn :utsk., led. av drätselkamm. fr. 47, suppl. i lokalstyr. 1. Ulricehamns samrealsk., av Älvsb. 1. landsting utsedd t. siuppl i direkt, f. Sjö-Gunnarsbo san. o. sjukst. i Ulricehamn, led. av styr. f. Ulricehamns hö-gerfören. o. södra Älvsb. högerförb.
translated: Josefson, Sten, manager, Ulricehamn, b. March 11, 1914 in Ulricehamn to wholesale merchant Erik J. and Ingeborg Andersson. — Graduated from high school in Borås in 1933, specialized course for students at the Gothenburg School of Business in 1934, Higher Technical School for Weaving and Knitting Industry in Chemnitz in 1937, practical experience in textile industry in Germany and Switzerland. Studied abroad in Germany, Switzerland, France, Belgium, and Czechoslovakia. Manager and board member of Erik Josefson & Co. AB in Ulricehamn since 1938. Board member of Ulricehamns Tidnings AB, where he served as managing director from 1943 to 1946. Member of the city council (conservative party) since 1943, as well as member of its preparatory committee. Also a member of the municipal board in Ulricehamns samrealskola, appointed by the Älvsborg county council as deputy member of the board for Sjö-Gunnarsbo sanatorium and hospital in Ulricehamn, and board member of Ulricehamns conservative association and the Southern Älvsborg Conservative Federation.

alumniOf.name: Higher Technical School for Weaving and Knitting Industry

memberOf.name: Älvsborg county council
memberOf.position: Deputy member of board for Sjö-Gunnarsbo sanatorium and hospital in Ulricehamn
